mapper.select: SELECT gymSeq, totalViewCount, reviewCount, CASE WHEN reviewCount = 0 THEN 0 ELSE averageRating / reviewCount END AS averageRating, totalLikeCount FROM gymStatistics WHERE gymSeq = #{gymSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE gymStatistics SET totalViewCount = #{totalViewCount}, averageRating = #{averageRating}, reviewCount = #{reviewCount}, totalLikeCount = #{totalLikeCount} WHERE gymSeq = #{gymSeq}
